item.title: Twitter Says Microsoft May Have Violated API Policies
item.description: Twitter Accuses Microsoft of Violating API Policies Twitter has sent a letter to Microsoft alleging that the company may have violated its API policies. The letter, which was sent by Twitter’s general counsel, Vijaya Gadde, to Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella, focuses on Microsoft’s use of Twitter’s API in several products including some related to Xbox; the search engine Bing; and advertising and other tools.
